special_text:
I – Unsheath. [i](Create a colorless Weapon artifact equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and “Equip {1}.”)[/i]
II – The first instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn gains rebound. [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
III – Exile up to one noncreature card from your graveyard. If you do, you draw two cards.
